title: Thunderbird email
content: my email is not synced to my phone or my other computer on my new Win11 computer . Yahoo is but not Thunderbird . I have to mark as read or delete messages that have been read on other devices when I get to this Win 11 machine . Thanks ! Ken
creator: kobark

title: Problem with email in outbox
content:
Can someone advise please, I am using an android tablet and have had no problems with thunderbird until recently. I send and receive email from multiple accounts, but occasionally it will stick the email in the outbox and nothing I do will send it.

The email address is correct because if I go to yahoo it will send the message.

It appears to be totally random from any of the six accounts I use. I have deleted each account, reinstalled thunderbird. No difference. I can send mail it goes yo outbox, send another and it gets sent. ??

I am getting to the stage where I am going to abandon thunderbird because I think email is sent and its not.
creator: catweazle883311

title: change in look
content:
on my laptop I must have changed something because now I don't see the end of the messages with the "bar" that allows me to delete and shows me a copy of the e:mail.

Don't know what I changed to make that disappear, but I want it back!

title: Authentication Problem with Yahoo email account
content:
I changed my yahoo password and can longer access this account in Thunderbird.

Now when I sign in to Thunderbird I get 'Edge To Many requests'

Unfortunately I deleted the yahoo user name and password in Thunderbird Password/ Saved Logins thinking Yahoo might automatically ask for my new password when re-starting Thunderbird

Can somebody help please.

Many thanks

title: Wie kann ich mein E mail Programm wieder auf meinen neuen Rechner bekommen

creator: schaefer39

title: pop3 leaving emails on server still even though this option is 'unchecked' ?
content: i have pop3 account and unchecked leave on server - but greyed and checked out is a 'leave for a maximum' which i have as 1 day, there doesnt seem to be an option to uncheck this? I dont want them on the server which is why i chose pop account. yet when i open web account, the emails already downloaded using the pop account are still there even thoug they were downloaded days ago. Why is this and how do stop this? is there a 'leave copy on server' box to uncheck that I am missing? i want to use pop to remove from server and just use locally but its not doing what i thought it would, which is remove from setver. Also it keeps repeating downloading from years ago so I was hoping that when the server synced it would stop downloading the ones it has already (mulitple times) I made an imap account to try to sort emails that way but it also shows old emails still on server. Should i delet this imap account as I already have a pop account running? Very confused. Help figuring out what to do appreciated.
creator: brew

title: richiesta  verifica  Mail
content:
Richiesta di aggiornamento impostazioni o esclusione dalla cartella spam Gentile Thunderbird, mi rivolgo a voi per segnalare un problema riguardante la ricezione ed invio delle mie email. Recentemente ho notato che molte mie comunicazioni vengono erroneamente filtrate e inviate alla cartella spam,molti mie clineti mi dicono di non ricevere le mie mail nonostante siano correttamente formattate e provenienti da indirizzi affidabili. Chiedo cortesemente di verificare le impostazioni del mio account e, se possibile, di aggiornare i filtri antispam per evitare che le mie email vengano classificate come spam in futuro. In alternativa, desidererei ricevere istruzioni su come escludere specifici indirizzi o domini dalla cartella spam. Ringrazio anticipatamente per l'attenzione e la collaborazione. Restando a disposizione per eventuali ulteriori informazioni o verifiche, porgo cordiali saluti. Spettacoli M.P di Maurizio padovani & C S.A.S info@spettacolimp.com 335.5385085 

 cordiali saluti

(U.E.) n. 679/2016.

Ogni trattamento delle suddette informazioni contrario alle appena descritte condizioni svolto da parte del destinatario potrà porre in capo allo stesso la responsabilità di risarcire l'eventuale danno materiale o immateriale subito dall'interessato in questione, ai sensi dell'art. 82 del reg. title: inline images missing from reply or forward
content:
I have a Windows 7 laptop with Tbird. Replies and forwards to messages include any inline images, as would be expected.

I recently installed Tbird on a new Windows 11 laptop. Now, any replies or forwards show a placeholder for inline images, not the images themselves.

I searched - and found - user postings describing the same problem with older versions of Tbird, but no confirmed fix or setting to correct the missing inline images.

Is this an issue with the current version (144.0.1}? If not, how can I fix it? Thank you, Bruce
creator: bgbama
